price: 10. Tozali kobanga Nkolo na biso тропа mokolo oyo ya somo mpe ya mabe koleka.
arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: innā nakhāfu min rabbinā yawman ʿabūsan qamṭarīran
